It won't blow you away, but it is most certainly maximum value for the low price and looks exactly like the pictures. If you're a couple and just looking for a place to sleep for the night while spending all day out and about, this is the place for you.
Just a short Uber-ride to Downtown - about 5-10 minutes by car. The backyard is as-advertised and while we didn't actually use it (weather was too cold) it looked very nice and I can see people having a good time back there with the pool table and in-ground pool. Covered driveway and easy check-in with the keycode for the door. James was easy to communicate with and was around the entire time we were there. If we needed anything I would just catch him outside or knock on his door.
I usually have trouble sleeping outside of my own home, but not this time - this is probably the most comfortable bed I've slept on between hotels/AirBnBs and it's not even close. My wife and I were both pretty surprised at how comfortable the bed was and we have both traveled quite a bit!
